summary:
Recruiters and Financial Advisors: If I don't know you, please don't ask to connect, because I will IGNORE you!

I am originally a software engineer, with experience of C/C++, Python and Java, working in software development and user support of space thermal analysis and engineering tools. Now my tasks mostly involve engineering support for spacecraft radiative analysis and testing.

One of my current projects involves consolidation of STEP-TAS data exchange protocol and upgrade of TASverter, an in-house Python program for converting geometrical models of spacecraft from one thermal tool format to another via STEP-TAS. 

In 2019 I completed an MEng with the Open University in the UK [part-time, distance learning]
